titles: Of the laws of chance, or, A method of calculation of the hazards of game plainly demonstrated and applied to games at present most in use : which may be easily extended to the most intricate cases of chance imaginable.
author: Arbuthnot, John, 1667-1735.
publisher: Printed by Benj. Motte, and sold by Randall Taylor ...,
notes: Attributed to Arbuthnot by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
